page.title: 07 MY HOUSE-WEEDON BEC
page.content: *** THE OLD VICARAGE *** My house was built in 1685 and re-built in 1852.It used to be {the vicarage}. On the walls of the stables are the names of some of the people who lived in or visited the house.Here are some of them:1879-H.Robinson 1918-N.Abbot 1928-K.Spencer 1940-K.Winnie 1962-W.Sutton 1972-M.Rogers It has nine bedrooms and a bathroom. Downstairs there are eight rooms,a cellar and a coal room.There is a little shed opposite the railway and there are two large fields.There are also stables where we keep two horses.
